item.title: PythonGame
item.description: 目录 start pygame 安装 目录 end|2020-04-27 23:42| pygame 安装 python2 安装 pygame sudo apt install python-pygame python3 安装 pygame sudo apt install python3-dev mercurial sudo apt install libsdl-image1.2-dev libsdl2-dev libsdl-ttf2.0-dev 安装一些声音的功能 sudo apt install libsdl-mixer1.2-dev libimportmidi-dev sudo apt install libswscale-dev libsmpeg-dev libavformat-dev libavcode-dev sudo apt install python-numpy 执行这个安装pyg
